firerate.title: Firerate Upgrade
firerate.description: Increases the rate of fire by @1

heal.title: Heal
heal.description:
Heals you @1
*Can not overflow max HP*

freezing_b.title: Freezing Bullets
freezing_b.description:
Every @1th bullet freezes enemies
*@2% to firerate*

triple_shot.title: Triple Shot
triple_shot.description:
You have @1% chance to shoot 3 bullets
*@2% to firerate*

double_trouble.title: Double Trouble
double_trouble.description:
Every chance based effect
is twice as likely to happen

bounce.title: bounce
bounce.description:
Your bullets have @1% chance to
bounce off walls
*@2% damage*

shoot_on_death.title: Last Stand Of Good
shoot_on_death.description:
When enemies die, they shoot @1 bullet
in driection of a random enemy
*Caps out at @2 bullets*

shoot_on_death_up.title: Last Stand Upgrade
shoot_on_death_up.description:
Increases amount of bullets shot from
enemies on thier death by @1
*Current amount @2*
*Caps out at @3*
